title: "Researchers rebuild the bridge between neuroscience and artificial intelligence"
excerpt: "Researchers have successfully rebuilt the bridge between experimental neuroscience and advanced artificial intelligence learning algorithms. Conducting new types of experiments on neuronal cultures, the researchers were able to demonstrate a new accelerated brain-inspired learning mechanism."
